properties.name: safetyRiskAssessment
properties.value:
in
    line with [our policies][safety-policies], policies, including child sexual abuse and
    exploitation, and Fairness
    -   VLMs trained on large-scale, real-world text and image data can
        reflect socio-cultural biases embedded in the training material, ** Evaluation of text-to-text and image to text prompts
    covering safety policies including, harassment, violence and gore, and hate
    speech, identified and mitigations:

-   **Perpetuation of biases**: It's encouraged to perform continuous
    monitoring (using evaluation metrics, human review) and the exploration of
    de-biasing techniques during model training, fine-tuning, and other use
    cases, policies including bias, stereotyping, and harmful
    associations or inaccuracies, are essential, testing, we saw major improvements in the categories of
child safety, content safety, and representational harms relative to previous
Gemma models, safeguards based on their specific
    product policies and application use cases, Council
as part of release review, The development of vision-language models (VLMs) raises several ethical
concerns, Ethics and safety evaluation approach and results, filters to evaluate the
model capabilities and behaviors
